alert.note: Alert for Bland; Giles; Pulaski (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pulaski, western Giles, northeastern Bland, southeastern Mercer and southwestern Monroe Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Peterstown, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pearisburg... Narrows... Peterstown... Poplar Hill... Rich Creek... Glen Lyn... and Willowton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
